alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mission Valley, or 12 miles west of Victoria, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Ander, Oak Village, Mission Valley and Weser. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 630 and 644. US Highway 59 between mile markers 645 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 580 and 584. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
